name: Future Unfolding
description: Future Unfolding is an action adventure that is all about exploration. Your goal is to unfold the mysteries and solve the puzzles hidden in the beautiful landscapes around you.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) Processor: 2.4GHz Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit) Processor: 2.7GHz Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 570 / AMD Radeon 7850 Storage: 400 MB available space
